original_title: Innocence of Memories: Orhan Pamuk's Museum & Istanbul
overview: Orhan Pamuk – Turkey’s Nobel laureate for Literature – opens a museum in Istanbul. A museum that’s a fiction: its objects trace a tale of doomed love in '70s Istanbul. The film takes a tour of the objects as the starting point for a trip through images, landscapes and the chemistry of the city.  A film about Istanbul, love, memory and loss.
title: Innocence of Memories
